title: Easy spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Bolognese sauce still tastes great, no matter how simple. Get that depth of flavour by cooking the sauce very gently until it’s super rich. This is designed to be a low cost recipe.Try the Eat Well for Less quiz to find out how you could cut your food bills.This sauce can be cooked in advance and frozen. Leave to cool completely then pop in a freezer-proof container, it will keep in the freezer for up to 2 months.
ingredients: 400ml/14fl oz stock (made from stock cube. Ideally beef, but any will do)
